greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Heinz numbers of strict integer partitions of even numbers. Squarefree numbers whose prime indices sum to an even number.
comment: The Heinz number of an integer partition (y_1, ..., y_k) is prime(y_1) * ... * prime(y_k).
example: 30 is the Heinz number of (3,2,1), which is strict and has even weight, so 30 belongs to the sequence.
xref: Complement of the union of A319242 and A013929.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Sep 15 2018
